item.response: Password rotation is required every 90 days with minimum 12 characters. VPN is required using Cisco provider.
item.ground_truth: Security policies include password rotation every 90 days and VPN requirement.

item.response: The database is PostgreSQL hosted at db.example.com on port 5432.
We use blue-green deployment strategy daily with Jenkins and Kubernetes.
item.ground_truth: Blue-green deployment daily using Jenkins and Kubernetes
